title: Agarest: Generations of War
notes: Crashes with this error: "prMovie::Open - Unable to connect pins 80040218"

title: Agarest: Generations of War
notes: Crashes at startup. WineHQ AppDB mentions that the game requires installing xact and d3dx9_42 with winetricks and then also placing rogue WMP10 DLLs into game folder to function and installing suitable additional Microsoft video codecs. Tested and it didn't cause the game to crash but instead made it freeze at start-up. Probably requires tweaking the codecs.
